Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29614317] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=0.61 μg/mL);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=3.25 μg/mL);Fungi:Candida albicans ATCC 10231 (MIC=1.63 μg/mL).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.29614317] HC50=7.51μg/mL against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.N-terminal Modification: Acylation (Gly1 conjugated with a palmitoyl group)
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity. The peptide is palmitoylated.

Literature.Title: Effects of truncation of the peptide chain on the secondary structure and bioactivities of palmitoylated anoplin.
Literature.Author: Salas RL, Garcia JKDL, Miranda ACR, Rivera WL, Nellas RB, Sabido PMG.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship study of anoplin
Literature.Author: Ifrah D, Doisy X, Ryge TS, Hansen PR
